alert.note: Alert for Jemez Mountains; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 13 at 10:33AM MDT until July 14 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures between 95 and 99 expected. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, and Jemez Mountains. * WHEN...For the first Heat Advisory, until 8 PM MDT this evening. For the second Heat Advisory, from Noon to 8 PM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke.

area.areaDesc: Jemez Mountains; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood
